Title: The Good Soldier
Plot: Reeling after losing key players in Nazir's plot against America, the CIA orders polygraphs on everyone who came in contact with them, including Brody, which Carrie sees as an opportunity to finally learn the truth.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Hrach Titizian, Omid Abtahi, Marin Ireland, Sarita Choudhury, James Urbaniak, Sherman Howard, Afton Williamson
